description: Buttery, seasonal, and made fresh daily with simple, quality ingredients.

plates.name: Croissant
plates.description: Buttery, flaky layers made with cultured French butter and slow-fermented dough.

plates.name: Pain Au Chocolat
plates.description: Classic croissant dough wrapped around dark chocolate batons and baked to golden perfection.

plates.name: Rose-Pistachio Cookies
plates.description: Delicate shortbread with crushed pistachios, rosewater, and a dusting of cardamom sugar.

plates.name: Blueberry Scones
plates.description: Tender cream scones folded with wild blueberries and finished with a lemon glaze.

plates.name: Saigon Cinammon Rolls
plates.description: Rich brioche dough swirled with Saigon cinnamon and brown sugar, topped with vanilla bean icing.

description: Elegant, not fussy—baked with fruits, spices, and a touch of nostalgia.

plates.description: Spiced carrot cake with toasted walnuts and golden raisins, finished with cream cheese frosting and fresh blueberries.

plates.name: Olive Oil Citrus Cake
plates.description: Moist and fragrant with cold-pressed olive oil, orange zest, and a delicate rosemary glaze.

plates.name: Chocolate Myrrh Torte
plates.description: Flourless dark chocolate cake infused with warm spice and a touch of myrrh syrup—rich, earthy, unforgettable.

plates.name: Rosewater Almond Cake
plates.description: Light almond sponge soaked in rose syrup and layered with whipped mascarpone.

plates.name: Vanilla Fig Layer Cake
plates.description: Madagascar vanilla cake with fig compote and honey buttercream between each tier.

description: Thoughtfully sourced and brewed to bring out warmth, depth, and balance.

plates.description: A smooth, full-bodied shot with notes of dark chocolate, dried fig, and toasted almond.

plates.description: Espresso blended with rose syrup and steamed milk, topped with dried petals.

plates.name: Honey Cardamom Cappuccino
plates.description: Creamy cappuccino laced with wildflower honey and a whisper of cardamom.

plates.name: Cold Bloom
plates.description: Slow-steeped cold brew with hints of molasses and plum, served over crystal-clear ice.

plates.name: Maplewood Mocha
plates.description: Dark cocoa, maple syrup, and espresso swirled into a rich, comforting cup.

description: Botanical blends and classic leaves, steeped slow and served with care.

plates.description: Black tea infused with bergamot and a touch of Lapsang Souchong for a gently smoky twist.

plates.description: Floral green tea blended with steamed milk and a hint of rosewater.

plates.description: Earl Grey, steamed milk, and lavender syrup—ethereal and softly floral.
